title: The rise of nine
creator: Lore, Pittacus, author
description: The third installment in the action-packed Lorien Legacies series that launched with "I Am Number Four" and "The Power of Six", finds the stakes higher than ever as John, Number Six, and Number Seven desperately try to find the rest of the Lorien Nine before it's too late
Includes excerpts from I am Number Four: the lost files novellas: Six's legacy (pages 1-13) ; Nine's legacy (1-11) ; The fallen legacies (1-12)
